data.prayer: Father, let those from the 29,943 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Belize, Belize
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Belize, Belize know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: There are 127,700 people living in the state of Belize. Only about 29,943 might be believers.
Father, encourage your church in Belize that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Sindhi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Sindhi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Sindhi people is yours.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Belize, Belize.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 97,757 lost in Belize that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Belize.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Belize
